metadata.name: Giorgione - Self Portrait
metadata.description:
This NFT is a 100 pieces Limited editions for the Revolution Paintersâ€™ collection that comes with special utilities.

1: Each NFT gives access in the Whitelist to the drops of the subsequent collections.

2: Each NFT purchased will guarantee the buyer to hold and to be "included" in the equal subdivision of part of the proceeds deriving from the sale of the physical "Mystery Masterpiece" described in the project Revolution Painters.

"Part of the proceeds" means: 50% of the difference between the sale price established and / or accepted by the seller and the actual sale price.

This is a reinterpretation by the Italian Artist Stefano Monda:

Giorgione - Self Portrait.

(Oil on paper 31x28-Museum of Fine Arts of Budapest-1510)  
The character emerges from the darkness with his torso in profile facing right and his head turned towards the viewer.  
Giorgione is to be considered the "first true contemporary artist", considered a precursor of romanticism.

 Follow the future of Revolution Painters!
